about_the_game:
This is the Original Soundtrack for the game Roof Rage. It was composed by Enrique Martin aka Pentadrangle. It contains all the OST in wav files. You can find those tracks in your Steam/steamapps/common/Roof Rage/

Tracks

  • 01.- Start Screen - Roof Rage Theme
  • 02.- City peak – The city peaks
  • 03.- City peak – The city peaks Showdown
  • 04.- Myanmar - Myanmar madness
  • 05.- Myanmar - Myanmar madness Showdown
  • 06.- Izakaya – Izakaya
  • 07.- Izakaya – Izakaya Showdown
  • 08.- Seoul Rooftop – Disroofted
  • 09.- Seoul Rooftop – Disroofted Showdown
  • 10.- Dragon Market – Night Crawler
  • 11.- Dragon Market – Night Crawler Showdown
  • 12.- The Ruins – Ruined
  • 13.- The Ruins – Ruined Showdown
  • 14.- Halong Bay – Halong Boost
  • 15.- Halong Bay – Halong Boost Showdown
  • 16.- The Dojo – Shamisen Fury
  • 17.- The Dojo – Shamisen Fury Showdown
  • 18.- Select Screen – Select your figther
